task: Send message and copy latest response
description: This task is to send a message to the chatgpt and copy the latest response

steps.description: Click on the chatgpt input box
Paste the message to the chatgpt input box
Send the message to the chatgpt
Wait for the chatgpt to respond
Click on the latest chatgpt response
Srcoll to end of the chatgpt chat history
Click the first matching copy icon starting from the bottom
